Sentencas: Anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) based on gadolinia-doped ceria (GDC) are developed in this study.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of gadolinia-doped ceria-based intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A carbonate co-precipitation method is used to synthesize the nano-sized GDC powders.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of gadolinia-doped ceria-based intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A dense GDC electrolyte thin film supported by a Ni-GDC porous anode is fabricated by dry-pressing and spin-coating processes, respectively.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of gadolinia-doped ceria-based intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In comparison with dry pressing, it is easy to prepare a thinner electrolyte film by the novel spin-coating method.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of gadolinia-doped ceria-based intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cell performance is examined using humidified (3% H2O) hydrogen as fuel and air as oxidant in the temperature range of 500-700 degrees C. Cell performance is strongly dependent on the electrolyte thickness.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of gadolinia-doped ceria-based intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With a porous Ni-GDC anode, a dense 19-mu m GDC electrolyte film and a porous La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-GDC cathode, the cell exhibits maximum power densities of 130, 253, 386 and 492 mW cm(-2) at 500, 550, 600 and 650 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of gadolinia-doped ceria-based intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is also found that at the low operating temperature about 500 degrees C, the cell resistance is significantly dominated by the electrode polarization resistance.
Titulo: Fabrication and performance of gadolinia-doped ceria-based intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Fabrication and performance of gadolinia-doped ceria-based intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Fabrication and performance of gadolinia-doped ceria-based intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
